useful_component_desc: There is no passion to be found in playing small in settling for a life less than the one you are capable of living.
useful_subdesc: One of the indisputable advantages for property buyers in Northern Cyprus is the right to obtain a residence permit and stay in Cyprus for a year without having to leave.
useful_anotherdesc: Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus became very popular and legally friendly area for international investors in the last 20 years of development. People from all over the world are investing in different projects in TRNC nowadays. The long-term projects with higher investment perspective especially those of short- and long-term rental, hotel, casino and trading centers are most popular between the investors on the island. People from the Mediterranean and many more countries are commencing their business in TRNC.
useful_desc_33: The Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus is an ideal place to travel and move to permanent residence. Wide infrastructure, high living standard and medicine excellent climate and nature, low prices and quality education. A small part of what attracts foreigners to stay or retire in the country.

about_intro: At SYRYS Investment Ltd, our marketing philosophy is centered around the power of referrals. We believe that the best way to grow our business is by providing outstanding service to our clients and earning their trust and loyalty. We know that satisfied clients are more likely to refer their friends and family to us, and we see this as the ultimate form of marketing.
about_intro2: At SYRYS Investment Ltd, We pride ourselves on offering top-notch administrative support to our clients. Our team of dedicated professionals is here to assist you with all of your administrative needs, from scheduling property showings and managing documents to handling inquiries and providing detailed reports. We understand that managing a property can be time-consuming and overwhelming, which is why we are here to help.We work with professionals from different nationalities which gives us an edge over competitors as our administration staff is trained to serve customers in the culture they understand.
about_intro3: At SYRYS investment ltd, we understand that every property and every client is unique, which is why we create flexible and adaptable individual plans for each of our listings. Our agents take the time to get to know the property, client and always open to making changes and adjustments to develop a customized strategy that is tailored to their specific needs.
team_state: Our team works 24 hours everyday ensuring you get the service you deserve. Contact an agent today!

investment_intro: Welcome to our investment section! We specialize in helping investors like you find the perfect property to add to your portfolio. Whether you’re looking for a rental property, a fixer-upper, or a new development opportunity, we have a wide range of properties available to suit your needs.
investment_intro_2: Our team of experienced real estate investment professionals have the knowledge and expertise to guide you through the investment process. We’ll work with you to identify properties that match your investment goals and budget, and then help you navigate the purchase process from start to finish.
investment_intro_3: We understand that real estate investing can be complex and time-consuming, which is why we’re here to make it as easy and stress-free as possible. We’ll take care of all the details, so you can focus on what really matters – growing your portfolio and earning great returns on your investment.
investment_intro_4: So, whether you’re a seasoned investor or just starting out, we’re here to help you achieve your real estate investment goals. Browse our selection of properties and let us know how we can assist you in finding the perfect investment opportunity.
investment_intro_5: MY "Given a 10% chance of a 100 times payoff, you should take that bet every time." — Jeff Bezos
